official_title: Congratulating the North Shore Senior High School football team of Houston, Texas, on their Class 5A Division I Texas State championship.

summary.text: Honors and congratulates Galena Park Independent School District's North Shore Senior High School football team in Houston, Texas, for their successful season and for their outstanding and memorable victory in the Class 5A Division I Texas State championship on December 13, 2003.

titles.title: Congratulating the North Shore Senior High School football team of Houston, Texas, on their Class 5A Division I Texas State championship.
